analysis.headline: Your data shared for ads
analysis.quote: If you have a BBC account we might use information that we hold about you to show you relevant and targeted advertising for BBC services through other companies’ sites, like Facebook, Google, Snapchat or Twitter for example... Where we do this, we will share your data in a hashed format with these providers... In these scenarios, we are joint controllers with these companies because we jointly determine the purposes and means of processing your personal data.

analysis.headline: Your data transferred globally
analysis.quote: Keep in mind that when you give us personal information it could be being transferred, stored or processed in a location outside the UK and the EEA.

analysis.headline: Your sensitive data collected
analysis.quote: If you apply to take part in a programme on politics, for example, we might ask you about your political opinions.

analysis.headline: Your online activity tracked
analysis.quote: We automatically collect some technical information from these devices and web browsers even when you're not signed into to a BBC account. This might include: IP (internet protocol) address device ID app ID vendor ID advertising ID

analysis.headline: Your precise location tracked
analysis.quote: Your location can be determined at a town or city level by: GPS IP address Information about nearby cell towers and Wi-Fi access point information

analysis.headline: Your tracking by third-parties
analysis.quote: Bear in mind there are some other cookies out there from other companies. These "third-party cookies" might track how you use different websites, including ours. For example, you might get a social media company’s cookie when you see the option to share something. You can turn them off, but not through us.

analysis.headline: Your data retained post-deletion
analysis.quote: If you're talking about BBC account... Your account information is immediately deleted. Keep in mind: we keep a record of how you've used our services, but this information can't be linked back to you we also keep anything you've uploaded or commented on

analysis.headline: Your rights limited by journalism
analysis.quote: Bear in mind, sometimes we might not be able to help. Like if the law tells us we can't or it forms part of our journalistic output.

analysis.headline: Your data shared broadly
analysis.quote: When we use other companies to power our services In order for us to give you quality experiences and to understand how you're using our services we often use other companies to process your personal information on our behalf.

analysis.headline: Your data shared for research
analysis.quote: We do research activities and sometimes collaborate with research partners. Every now and then we share our content and data with them. This might include information we’ve collected about you.
